properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from South Santee River to Edisto Beach SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 19 at 6:34AM EST until February 20 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce
visibility to 1/4 NM or less. For the Small Craft Advisory,
northeast winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 3
to 6 ft expected. For the Gale Watch, north winds 20 to 30 kt
with gusts up to 40 kt and seas 6 to 9 ft possible.

* WHERE...South Santee River to Edisto Beach out 20 NM.

* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 10 AM EST this
morning. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 6 PM this evening
to 3 PM EST Thursday. For the Gale Watch, from Thursday
afternoon through Friday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Low
visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM EST THURSDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON
